title: Fresh Minted Mango-Chutney Burger Topping
ingredients: 1 Ripe mango (1 lb), halved,|Pitted peeled & cut in small|Pieces|2 tb Minced red onion|2 tb Fresh lime juice|1 tb Minced crystallized ginger|1/4 ts Crushed coriander seeds|1/4 ts Crushed red pepper|1 tb Chopped fresh mint
instructions: Gently mix all ingredients, except mint, in a bowl until well blended. Cover & chill at least 2 hours or up to 4 days. Stir in mint 15 minutes before serving.
